info.name: Pride Tumblr Logo by Ira V. Simon
info.description: To celebrate the LGBT Pride Month, Tumblr released a rainbow logo. Now, don't you wish you could have this logo forever? Now you can do it by adding this script!
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE JANUARY 2017:
- Updated code and logo, which stopped working due to Tumblr update.

Script by Ira V. Simon
http://priveting.tumblr.com/
